Source.Name: fb2converter
Source.Summary: Unified converter of FB2 files into epub2, kepub, mobi and azw3 formats.
Source.Description: CLI ebook format converter, a complete rewrite of fb2mobi. Aims to be faster than python implementation and much easier to maintain. Simpler configuration, zero dependencies, better diagnostics and no installation required.
